official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29-July 5 as Why I Love America Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to annually proclaim the week of June 29 through July 5 as "Why I Love America Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29-July 5 as Why I Love America Week.
